sqlMap.select: SELECT DECODE(SIGN((SELECT COUNT(item_no) FROM gipi_witem WHERE par_id = #parId#)), 1, 'Y', 'N') exist FROM dual
SELECT DECODE(SIGN((SELECT COUNT(item_no) FROM gipi_witem WHERE par_id = #parId# AND rec_flag='A')), 1, 'Y', 'N') exist FROM dual
SELECT takeup_term FROM GIPI_WPOLBAS WHERE par_id = #parId#

SELECT 'Y' FROM giri_frps_ri a, giri_binder b, giri_distfrps c, giuw_pol_dist d WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.fnl_binder_id = b.fnl_binder_id AND a.line_cd = c.line_cd AND a.frps_yy = c.frps_yy AND a.frps_seq_no = c.frps_seq_no AND c.dist_no = d.dist_no AND d.par_id = #parId#
SELECT bond_auto_prem FROM GIPI_WPOLBAS WHERE par_id = #parId#

SELECT * FROM TABLE(gipi_polbasic_pkg.get_gipi_polbasic(#lineCd#, #sublineCd#, #issCd#, #issueYy#, #polSeqNo#, #renewNo#,#findText#)) WHERE ENDT_ISS_CD IS NULL OR ENDT_SEQ_NO IS NULL OR ENDT_YY IS NULL
